lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "For lunch I buy the teishoku (daily special) which comes with soba (buckwheat noodles) or pork cutlet, pickles, miso soup, rice and tea," although she takes only coffee for breakfast and a sandwich for dinner.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It gives budget-saving tips on finding medium-priced business hotels and Japanese-style inns, cheap sushi and public baths while getting a "revealing glimpse of Japanese in their daily lives."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: While the businessmen have little choice but to come here, many tourists, especially those from Europe, are opting to visit sunnier and cheaper climes in Southeast Asia.

lst.name: sentence
